src:
Koreaner vill investera i dotterbolag till Anoto – som vill göra ännu en emission
Small cap-bolaget Anoto, som utvecklar digitala pennor, har hittat en intressent som vill köpa en del av bolagets dotterbolag Knowledge till en högre värdering än hela Anotos börsvärde. Samtidigt utvärderar Anoto ännu en emission.
01 Nov 2019, 15:04 by Jonathan Axelsson

text:
Koreans want to invest in subsidiaries of Anoto - who want to make another issue
The small cap company Anoto, which develops digital pens, has found a stakeholder who wants to buy part of the company's subsidiary Knowledge at a higher valuation than the entire Anoto market capitalization. At the same time, Anoto is evaluating another issue.
01 Nov 2019, 15:04 by Jonathan Axelsson
